resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Destroying or eating part of the crops, the hippopotamus was considered in Egypt most often as a manifestation of negative forces. The hippopotamus was therefore dedicated to Seth, the god who murdered Osiris, his own brother. This description, interpreted symbolically, would target all human impulses and vices.
resource.chars: Destroying or eating part of the crops, the hippopotamus was considered in Egypt most often as a manifestation of negative forces. The hippopotamus was therefore dedicated to Seth, the god who murdered Osiris, his own brother. This description, interpreted symbolically, would target all human impulses and vices.
